column1: Registration
* How do I register?

- You can register by clicking on the "Register" link at the top right corner of the homepage. Please provide the information in the form that appears. You can review the terms and conditions, provide your payment mode details and submit the registration information.
* Are there any charges for registration?
- No. Registration on GrocerEase is absolutely free.
* Do I have to necessarily register to shop on GrocerEase ?

- You can surf and add products to the cart without registration but only registered shoppers will be able to checkout and place orders. Registered members have to be logged in at the time of checking out the cart, they will be prompted to do so if they are not logged in.
* Can I have multiple registrations?
Each email address and contact phone number can only be associated with one GrocerEase  account.
* Can I add more than one delivery address in an account?

Yes, you can add multiple delivery addresses in your GrocerEase  account. However, remember that all items placed in a single order can only be delivered to one address. If you want different products delivered to different address you need to place them as separate orders.
* Can I have multiple accounts with same mobile number and email id?
Each email address and phone number can be associated with one GrocerEase  account only.
* Can I have multiple accounts for members in my family with different mobile number and email address but same or common delivery address?

Yes, we do understand the importance of time and the toil involved in shopping groceries. Up to three members in a family can have the same address provided the email address and phone number associated with the accounts are unique.
* Can I have different city addresses under one account and still place orders for multiple cities?
Yes, you can place orders for multiple cities.
Account Related
What is My Account?

My Account is the section you reach after you log in at GrocerEase .com. My Account allows you to track your active orders, credit note details as well as see your order history and update your contact details.
How do I reset my password?

You need to enter your email address on the Login page and click on forgot password. An email with a reset password will be sent to your email address. With this, you can change your password. In case of any further issues please contact our customer support team.
What are credit notes & where can I see my credit notes?

Credit notes reflect the amount of money which you have pending in your GrocerEase  account to use against future purchases. This is calculated by deducting your total order value minus undelivered value. You can see this in "My Account" under credit note details.
What is My Shopping List?
My Shopping List is a comprehensive list of all the items previously ordered by you on GrocerEase .com. This enables you to shop quickly and easily in future.
Payment
What are the modes of payment?
You can pay for your order on GrocerEase .com using the following modes of payment:
a. Cash on delivery (COD)
b. Credit and debit cards (VISA / Mastercard / Rupay)
c. Paytm food wallet will be accepted only for food items.
If the order has to be left at the security gate, please continue to pay online via wallets, UPI, net banking, or cards as you are doing now.
If you choose COD as the payment method, you will need to pay our delivery executive in cash at the time of delivery.

To minimize contact, please give the executive the exact amount or the order total rounded up to the nearest hundred. For example, if your order value is Rs.1,235, please pay exactly this amount or Rs.1,300.
The executive will not be able to return any change. Any balance due will be credited directly to your GrocerEase  wallet which you can utilise in your next order.
The option is currently available only for GrocerEase  mobile app users.
Are there any other charges or taxes in addition to the price shown? Is VAT added to the invoice?
There is no VAT. However, GST will be applicable as per Government Regulizations.
Is it safe to use my credit/ debit card on GrocerEase ?

Yes it is absolutely safe to use your card on GrocerEase .com. A recent directive from RBI makes it mandatory to have an additional authentication pass code verified by VISA (VBV) or MSC (Master Secure Code) which has to be entered by online shoppers while paying online using visa or master credit card. It means extra security for customers, thus making online shopping safer
What is the meaning of cash on delivery?
Cash on delivery means that you can pay for your order at the time of order delivery at your doorstep.
If I pay by credit card how do I get the amount back for items not delivered?

If we are not able to delivery all the products in your order and you have already paid for them online, the balance amount will be refunded to your GrocerEase  account as store credit and you can use it at any time against your future orders. Should you want it to be credited to your bank account please contact our customer support team and we will refund it back on to your card.
Where do I enter the coupon code?

Once you are done selecting your products and click on checkout you will be prompted to select delivery slot and payment method. On the payment method page there is a box where you can enter any evoucher/ coupon code that you have. The amount will automatically be deducted from your invoice value.
What is GrocerEase  Wallet?

The GrocerEase  Wallet is a pre-paid credit account that is associated with your GrocerEase  account. This prepaid account allows you to pay a lump sum amount once to GrocerEase  and then shop multiple times without having to pay each time.
Delivery Related
When will I receive my order?

Once you are done selecting your products and click on checkout you will be prompted to select delivery slot. Your order will be delivered to you on the day and slot selected by you. If we are unable to deliver the order during the specified time duration (this sometimes happens due to unforeseen situations).
How are the fruits and vegetables packaged?
Fresh fruits and vegetables are hand picked, hand cleaned and hand packed in reusable plastic trays covered with cling. We ensure hygienic and careful handling of all our products.
How are the fruits and vegetables weighed?

Every fruit and vegetable varies a little in size and weight. While you shop we show an estimated weight and price for everything priced by kilogram. At the time of delivery we weigh each item to determine final price. This could vary by a maximum of one unit weight depending on the article. In case the weight of the product is lesser than what you ordered, you will pay correspondingly less.
How will the delivery be done?
We have a dedicated team of delivery personnel and a fleet of vehicles operating across the city which ensures timely and accurate delivery to our customers.
How do I change the delivery info (address to which I want products delivered)?

You can change your delivery address on our website once you log into your account. Click on "My Account" at the top right hand corner and go to the "Update My Profile" section to change your delivery address.
How much are the delivery charges for an order on GrocerEase , bb Express or Meat Express?

For any order value below INR 600, a delivery charge of INR 50 will be applied. For any order value between INR 600 and INR 1000, a delivery charge of INR 10 will be applied (Rs. 15 in Mumbai). All orders above INR 1000 will not incur any delivery charge. The aforementioned delivery charges are applicable in all locations except the ones mentioned below.
For select locations in Lucknow & Patna:

For any order value below INR 250, a delivery charge of INR 60 will be applied. For any order value between INR 251 and INR 1200, a delivery charge of INR 30 will be applied. All orders above INR 1200 will not incur any delivery charge.

For select locations in Agra, Allahabad, Bareilly, Bhopal, Bhubaneshwar-Cuttack, Chandigarh Tricity, Coimbatore, Guwahati, Hubli, Indore, Jaipur, Kochi, Kozhikode, Mysore, Nagpur, Nashik, Raipur, Rajkot, Ranchi, Surat, Vadodara, Vijayawada-Guntur & Visakhapatnam:

For any order value below INR 250, a delivery charge of INR 60 will be applied. For any order value between INR 251 and INR 1000, a delivery charge of INR 30 will be applied. All orders above INR 1000 will not incur any delivery charge.
How much are the delivery charges for an order on bbnow
Delivery charges will be applied for bbnow orders based on various factors such as order value, time of day, weather etc.
Do you deliver in my area?
You will be able to check this detail at the time of checkout when you enter the address. If we are unable to deliver in your area - we will inform you before checkout.
Will someone inform me if my order delivery gets delayed?
In case of a delay, our customer support team will keep you updated about your delivery.
What is the minimum order value required for delivery?
There is no minimum order value needed for delivery.
Do you do same day delivery?
We do same day delivery provided you place your order before 12 noon on the day you want delivery. Please note that we do same day delivery in Bangalore,Hyderabad,Delhi-NCR,Mumbai, Pune & Chennai.
What is Same Day Delivery?

GrocerEase  has now started same day delivery. All you have to do is order before 12 noon and we will deliver it to you the same day evening*. Any order placed after 12 noon will be delivered the next day in the slot chosen by you. For example if you place the order before 12 noon you can choose from either 4:30 pm to 7:00 pm or 7:30 pm to 10 pm slot. But, if order is placed after 12 noon you will receive it the next day in the slot chosen by you. Please note that we do same day delivery in Bangalore,Hyderabad,Delhi-NCR,Mumbai, Pune & Chennai. *Subject to slot availability.
Is Same Day Delivery applicable to only a few products or all products?
The Same day Delivery is applicable to our entire range of products. Please note that we do same day delivery in Bangalore,Hyderabad,Delhi-NCR,Mumbai, Pune & Chennai.
What will be the handling charges for my orders on bbnow & bbSuperSaver?
bbnow - Handling charge of Rs 6/- will apply to all orders placed on bbnow.

bbSuperSaver - Handling charge of Rs 6/- will apply to all orders placed on bbSuperSaver for select Cities - Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Kolkata, Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida-Ghaziabad, Ahmedabad-Gandhinagar.
Order Related
What are delivery slots?
Delivery slots are time slots during which you will receive your order.
What is a cut-off time and what are the corresponding cut-off timing for each slot?

Cut off time is the time after which the order gets processed for delivery. After this time you will not be able to modify or cancel your order, cut off time for Slot 3 & Slot 4 is 12 noon on the same day and cut off time for Slot 1 & Slot 2 is 7 pm on the previous day. Actual cut off timings for HYD : For Slot 3 & Slot 4 is 11 AM on the same day and for Slot 1 & Slot 2 is 6 PM on the previous day.
Can I add products after the cut off time for a slot?

No, you will not be able to make any changes to your order after the cut off time for your selected slot. However, if you do not wish to buy a product you may return it at the time of delivery and the amount will be credited to your GrocerEase  account.
How can I check availability of next slot before placing order?
Once you log in to your account, you will notice that on the right side of the website, under "My Basket" the next available slot in which you can order will be displayed.
Can I change my order delivery slot after placing the order?

Delivery slot cannot be changed once the order is placed. In case of an urgent requirement of change of slot please contact our customer support team and we will try our best to accommodate your request.
How do I add or remove products after placing my order?
Once you have placed your order you will not be able to make modifications on the website. Please contact our customer support team for any modification of order.
How long will my chosen slot be blocked for me?
5 minutes. After this the slot will be released for other shoppers on the website.
Is it possible to order an item which is out of stock?
No you can only order products which are in stock. We try to ensure availability of all products on our website however due to supply chain issues sometimes this is not possible
How do I check the current status of my order?
The only way you can check the status of your order is by contacting our customer support team.
How do I check which items were not available from my order? Will someone inform me about the items unavailable in my order before delivery?
You will receive an email as well as an sms about unavailable items before the delivery of your order.
What You Receive Is What You Pay For

At the time of delivery, we advise you to kindly check every item as in the invoice. Please report any missing item that is invoiced. As a benefit to our customers, if you are not available at the time of order delivery or you haven't checked the list at the time of delivery we provide a window of 48hrs to report missing items. This is applicable only for items that are invoiced.
When and how can I cancel an order?

You can cancel an order before the cut off time of your slot (1 pm for evening slots and 6 am for morning slots) by contacting our customer support team or you can also cancel your order from the Customer Service section on the GrocerEase  app.
What is the estimated delivery time for BBNow orders?

An estimated delivery time of your Order will be displayed on the GrocerEase  now order page. Delivery timeframes, unless stated otherwise on the Site or App, are just estimates and are not guaranteed delivery timeframes and should not be relied upon. Deliveries to certain locations may take longer than expected due to accessibility issues and other operational challenges.
Customer Related
How do I contact customer service?
Our customer service team is available throughout the week, all seven days from 6 am to 10 pm. They can be reached at 18601231000 or via email at customerservice@GrocerEase .com
What are your timings to contact customer service?
Our customer service team is available throughout the week, all seven days from 6 am to 10 pm.
How can I give feedback on the quality of customer service?

Our customer support team constantly strives to ensure the best shopping experience for all our customers. We would love to hear about your experience with GrocerEase . Do write to us at customerservice@GrocerEase .com in case of positive or negative feedback.
How do I raise a claim with customer service for any of the Guarantees - Delivery Guarantee, Quality Guarantee?

If you face any issues with price, quality or delivery of products we will take every measure to address the issue and make it up to you. Please contact our customer support team with details or your order as well as the issue you faced.
Will GrocerEase  ask for sensitive information such as bank account details, PIN number, card number?

Please note that our customer service team will never ask you to share information other than your email ID, phone number, and name registered with GrocerEase . If you get any email, call or message from anyone claiming to be from GrocerEase  asking for sensitive information such as bank account details, PIN number, card number, etc., please do not share it.
Expectation of fair conduct in dealings / transactions with GrocerEase

GrocerEase  inter alia reserves the right to terminate, suspend or deactivate the customer's account, if the customer has been involved in activities that are fraudulent / unlawful or if the conduct or action of the customer causes or is likely to cause harm to any person or entity, as well as GrocerEase 's employees, customer service executives and/or delivery personnel(s).

By availing the services offered by GrocerEase , the customer agrees not to engage in any conduct or action which is illegal, offensive, abusive, indecent, obscene, invasive of another's privacy, including bodily privacy, insulting, or harassing on the basis of gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, culture, economic status or social background; racially or ethnically objectionable, or disparaging, or otherwise injurious to third parties or promoting enmity between different groups on any grounds, with the intent to incite violence. You will not have any claim towards GrocerEase  and GrocerEase  will not have any liability towards you for any termination or suspension that is undertaken, as a result of the aforementioned event(s) attributable to the customer.
Returns & Refund Policy (Updated)

1. The Return & Exchange Policy entitles customers to return products for a refund or exchange the product for a replacement within its eligible return / exchange window. Return & Exchange window for every product can be confirmed on the Product Description Page of that product and is in accordance with the following:.
Fruits, Vegetables, Milk products, & Meat products: Within 48 hours of delivery date
Other Products: Within 7 days of delivery date
Non-Returnable & Non-Exchangeable Products

We do not provide Return or Exchange facility for products marked as non-returnable & non-exchangeable on its respective Product Description Page. For these products, please contact the brand's service centre directly.
Return, Exchange, and Cancellation policy for Electronics:
Return & Exchange for electronic products is permitted in accordance with the return / exchange details given on the Product Description Page.
Easy doorstep cancellation of Electronics Products is allowed if the product is not accepted at the time of delivery, remains unopened, unused, and sealed.
2. Where are refunds processed?
Refunds for returned products are processed in the bbWallet. Upon request, the same can be processed to the source payment account.
Others
Where can I find currently running offers/ promotions?
There is a link called "Store Wide Offers" on the top right hand side of our website. All products with any discount or promotions are listed under this section.
What do I do if an item is defective (broken, leaking, expired)?

We have a no questions asked return policy. In case you are not satisfied with a product received you can return it to the delivery personnel at time of delivery or you can contact our customer support team and we will do the needful.
How will I get my money back in case of a cancellation or return?

What are the modes of refund?The amount will be refunded to your GrocerEase .com account to use as store credit in your forthcoming purchases. In case of credit card payments we can also credit the money back to your credit card. The money will be credited back to your account in 7-10 working days.  Please contact customer support for any further assistance regarding this issue.
I am a corporate/ business. Can I place orders with GrocerEase .com?
Yes, we do bulk supply of products at special prices to institutions such as schools, restaurants and corporates. Please contact as at Business@GrocerEase .com to know more.
I'd like to suggest some products. Who do I contact?
If you are unable to find a product or brand that you would like to shop for, please write to us at customerservice@GrocerEase .com and we will try our best to make the product available to you.
How & where I can give my feedback?

We always welcome feedback, both positive and negative from all our customers. Please feel free to write to us at customerservice@GrocerEase .com, or call us on 1860 123 1000 and we will do our best to incorporate your suggestions into our system.
There is a difference in the amount mentioned in the invoice sent by the store and the order value shown by GrocerEase  when placing the order. Why should I pay the extra amount?

Fruits and Vegetables are natural products that come in different shapes and sizes. While we have a strict control on the average sizes and weights, there is always scope for weight to vary from your ordered quantity. As a process we make sure that in all conditions only a maximum of one unit can go extra and hence you will be changed pro rata for the extra quantity.
Are Delivery Tokens issued?
The Delivery Token policy has been permanently withdrawn from the GrocerEase  delivery mandates and shall not be issued until further notice.
Is there an expiry date to my wallet credit?
No, there is no expiry date on the reward amount. Once the money is credited to your GrocerEase  wallet, it stays there till its used.
How do I check my wallet balance?
You can view your wallet balance and its associated details under "My Wallet" section in "My Accounts" page.
Gold Coins
Where does GrocerEase  get the Gold Coin from?
Tanishq and GrocerEase  have partnered during the festive season and made Gold Coins available for online orders.
Are the Gold Coins certified or hallmarked for purity?
Yes, Gold Coins are assured with purity of:
- 91.6% for the 22 Karat Gold Coin (0.5 Gm and 1 Gm)
- 999 Fine gold for the 24 Karat Gold Coin (0.5 Gm and 1 Gm)
How to check the authenticity of the Gold Coin?
To check the authenticity of the Gold Coin, refer to the original invoice and the certificate of authenticity that is delivered along with the Gold Coin.
How is the price calculated for the Gold Coin?
The price for the 1 gm Gold Coin on a day is based on the E-com Gold rate of 10 gm Gold on the same day for respective 22K and 24K variances.
Is the price for the Gold Coin updated daily?
Yes, the price is updated daily according to the price change in the rate of 10 gm Gold.
What payment methods are accepted for purchasing Gold Coins?
For purchasing Gold Coins, the following online modes of payment are accepted:
UPI
Credit Card
Debit Card
Netbanking
Third-Party Wallets
NeuCoins
Please note: EMI options and Cash on Delivery is not allowed for purchasing a Gold Coin.
How is the safety and security of the Gold Coin ensured during delivery?
The Gold Coin is specially covered and sealed in a blistering packaging that is handled with utmost care during delivery.
Are there any additional delivery charges for Gold Coin orders?
No, there are no additional charges for Gold Coin orders.However, Handling Charges will be applicable.
What is the estimated delivery time for orders containing Gold Coins?

Estimated delivery time for bbnow orders containing a Gold Coin can be seen on the app once an order is placed. However, this time may vary depending on delivery address, availability of delivery agents, time of day, and other unforeseen circumstances.
What is the Return and Exchange policy?

Gold Coins are non-returnable, non-exchangeable, and non-refundable items once delivered. However, you can choose to reject taking the Gold Coin at the time of delivery and the amount for the Gold Coin will be refunded to your source account.
What is the cancellation policy for Gold Coins?
Orders with Gold Coins can be cancelled before order delivery. In such a case, the refund will be credited back to your source accounts.
Silver Coins and Bars
Where does GrocerEase  get the Silver Coins from?
Tanishq and GrocerEase  have partnered for the online sale of Silver Coins during the festive season.
Are the Silver Coins certified or hallmarked for purity?
Yes, all Tanishq Silver Coins are certified for purity. Each product comes with a certificate of authenticity in the Certicard, ensuring its authenticity and purity.
How to check the authenticity of the Silver Coin?
The certificate of authenticity in the Certicard by Tanishq provides a guarantee that the purity mentioned on the product/packing is authentic.
How is the price calculated for the Silver Coin?

The final price is calculated as a total of the price for the Tanishq Silver Coin and the making charges. The price of Tanishq Silver Coin varies based on the daily fluctuations in Silver prices on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) however, the making charges remain the same.
Is the price for the Silver Coin updated daily?
Yes, the price is updated daily according to current market prices of Silver on the MCX.
What payment methods are accepted for purchasing Silver Coins?
For purchasing Silver Coins the following online modes of payment are accepted:
UPI
Credit Card
Debit Card
Netbanking
Third-Party Wallets
NeuCoins
Please note: EMI options and Cash on Delivery is not allowed for purchasing Silver Coins.
How is the safety and security of the Silver Coin ensured during delivery?
The Silver Coin is specially covered and sealed in a blistering packaging that is handled with utmost care during delivery.
Are there any additional delivery charges for Silver Coin?
No, there are no additional charges for Silver Coin orders. However, Handling Charges will be applicable.
What is the estimated delivery time for orders containing Silver Coin?

Estimated delivery time for bbnow orders containing a Silver Coin can be seen on the app once an order is placed. However, this time may vary depending on delivery address, availability of delivery agents, time of day, and other unforeseen circumstances.
What is the Return and Exchange policy?

Silver Coins are non-returnable, non-exchangeable, and non-refundable items once delivered. However, you can choose to reject taking the Silver Coin at the time of delivery and the amount for the Silver Coin will be refunded to your source account.
What is the cancellation policy for Silver Coins?
Orders with Silver Coins can be cancelled before order delivery. In such a case, the refund will be credited to your source account.
TataNeu
What is TataNeu?

TataNeu is a power-packed new world where you can shop for all your needs, order food, book your travel, make bill payments, get financial services, and so much more. TataNeu brings you unmatchable offers, personalised suggestions, and exciting content. The best part - you can earn and use NeuCoins across multiple brands on TataNeu.
What are NeuCoins? What can I do with them?

NeuCoins are the universal reward points that you can earn and use across brands on TataNeu. You can earn NeuCoins and use them to get discounts on shopping, hotel & flight bookings, ordering food, and so much more. 1 NeuCoin = Re.1
What are the different things I can do on TataNeu?
"TataNeu opens for you a whole new world, in which you can:?
1. Shop for the things you love - fashion, electronics, grocery and more
2. Give wings to your travel plans, by booking flights & hotels?
3. Indulge the gourmet in you, by ordering food from the most iconic restaurants at unmatched deals
4. Make payments for not just shopping and bookings, but also transfer money to your family or friends?
5. Stay on top of your bills, by paying them easily in one go?
6. Need financial help? Personal loans, easy credit and insurance plans?will be within your reach
7. Earn as you spend. You can earn NeuCoins when you shop across multiple brands on TataNeu. You can use these NeuCoins for discounts on your next shopping or travel booking
8. Feel special, with personalized & unmatchable offers that bring you even closer to everything you love?
9. Stand out from the rest, with personalized recommendations and reads"
What are the rewards & benefits I get with TataNeu?

"TataNeu brings to you a rewarding, easy to use world, designed around you. You can earn NeuCoins on your shopping, food orders, travel bookings and more! Use these NeuCoins to get discounts across multiple brands on TataNeu. What's more, when you sign up on TataNeu, you also unlock the opportunity to earn 5% extra NeuCoins. You also get unmatchable offers, experiences, privileges, and much more on TataNeu. "
Does TataNeu have any tiers for its rewards?
Currently, TataNeu has no tiers. However, some brands on TataNeu have tiers called 'badges' depending on your order history with the brand.
Why have my loyalty memberships with various brands been merged on TataNeu?

We know you love your memberships with our partner brands, so we've brought them all together on TataNeu. Now, you can get more rewards from your favourite brands and use them for your shopping, bookings, and orders across brands.
What happens to my existing rewards, points and membership benefits?

They move with you! You can continue to enjoy your existing rewards, NeuCoins, and benefits from various brands, on TataNeu. Your current points will get merged into your NeuCoins balance, and your membership privileges from our partner brands will also continue. The terms of your membership with the partner brand will also continue to hold good.
How can I earn NeuCoins?
You can earn NeuCoins through eligible transactions on TataNeu and TataNeu's partner brands.
How can I use my NeuCoins?
"You can use your NeuCoins to get discounts on a bunch of things including:
- AirAsia India flight bookings
- GrocerEase  Orders
- Purchases from Croma
- Stays, dining, bar & spa spends at IHCL hotels
- Shopping on Tata CLiQ

If you are shopping online, you can use your NeuCoins by selecting Tata Pay as the payment method. If you are shopping in-store, you can inform the cashier that you'd like to pay with your NeuCoins. NeuCoins can only be used on eligible transactions as defined by the individual brands and the NeuCoins with the closest expiry date will be used up first so that you can get the most out of your rewards"
When will my NeuCoins expire?

"Your NeuCoins expire 365 days after your last transaction involving an eligible earn or use of NeuCoins (even if it's just one NeuCoin earned or used). During special promotions, you might also earn additional NeuCoins. The expiry of these NeuCoins will be mentioned at the time of issuance."
Can I earn or use my NeuCoins in fractions?

No, NeuCoins cannot be earned or used in fractions. They're rounded off to the nearest integer just the way you rounded decimals in school. NeuCoins greater than or equal to 0.5 are rounded up while NeuCoins less than 0.5 are rounded down.
How do I check my NeuCoins balance and badge related information on TataNeu?
"That's easy. Here's how you can check your NeuCoins balance or badge-related information on the TataNeu app or website:
1. Look for your NeuCoins balance on the TataNeu homepage
2. To know about your badge, click on NeuCoins
3. Click on 'View details'
4. Scroll down to 'Your badges' and select the respective card"
Do I need to have an existing membership of any particular brands to join TataNeu?
No, that's not required. Everyone is welcome to sign up for TataNeu.
Are there any charges to sign up for TataNeu?
No, it's rewarding all the way! There are no charges whatsoever for becoming a TataNeu member.
I am a non-resident Indian (NRI). Can I still join TataNeu??
Yes, absolutely! TataNeu is open to everyone. Be sure to mention the privacy laws that apply to you, when you sign up.
I am not an Indian citizen. Can I still sign up for TataNeu?
Yes, you can certainly join TataNeu. Do make sure to mention the privacy laws that apply to you when you sign up.
Is a phone number or email address necessary to sign up on TataNeu?

Only your mobile number and the OTP sent to it are needed to sign up for TataNeu. Currently, there is no option to sign up using your email ID but it is needed to send monthly NeuCoins statements and other important communication.
How long does it take for NeuCoins to be deducted after I use my NeuCoins for a transaction?
If the transaction is successful, then NeuCoins are deducted immediately from your account
My transaction failed, but NeuCoins got deducted from my account. What do I do?
If the transaction has failed, then the corresponding NeuCoins will be refunded to your account within 24 hours.
Is there a way I can get back my expired NeuCoins?
No, as of now, there is no way to reverse expired NeuCoins into your account.
Will I receive a statement about my NeuCoins?
Yes, to ensure total clarity we will send you a monthly statement on your registered email address.
What happens to my NeuCoins if I cancel or return a product?
If you cancel or return any order that you had paid for with NeuCoins, your NeuCoins will be refunded to you. Also, any NeuCoins you had earned on that order will be deducted from your balance.
By when will my NeuCoins be credited to me, after my purchase?
The NeuCoins for your GrocerEase  order will be credited immediately after the delivery of your order
How exactly do I earn NeuCoins, while shopping at GrocerEase ?
It's easy. Every time you shop at GrocerEase , you earn NeuCoins based on a percentage of your eligible spends. This works out to 0.25%, or 1 point for every Rs.400 worth of eligible spends.

Also, remember how numbers with decimals were rounded off to the nearest integer in school? It's the same with NeuCoins. We will round up your NeuCoins to the closest integer and credit them in your account.
Which GrocerEase  purchases are eligible for earning NeuCoins?

You earn NeuCoins on all GrocerEase  online orders paid through any mode except using only NeuCoins. However, if only a portion of the payment is made using NeuCoins, you will earn NeuCoins on the other part.
Which GrocerEase  purchases are not eligible for earning NeuCoins?
"NeuCoins are not awarded for the following purchases:
1. GrocerEase  gift card purchases
2. GrocerEase  wallet recharges
3. Full or partial payments made using NeuCoins"
Can I spend my NeuCoins as soon as I earn them for my GrocerEase  purchases?

No, the NeuCoins earned on your GrocerEase  order can't be used immediately. While you earn NeuCoins at the time of delivery, you can use them only 7 days after. To put it simply, if today is D, NeuCoins can be used at D+7.
What is the period of expiry for promotional NeuCoins?

Promotional NeuCoins are awarded as part of specific initiatives and the expiry for the same can vary based on the campaign. Tata Neu reserves the right and sole discretion to modify the expiry date based on internal considerations.
Pharma
What is pharma?

GrocerEase  and TATA 1 MG have partnered to provide you the experience of TATA 1 MG within the GrocerEase  app. Once you click on the pharma icon on the bb app, you will be redirected to the TATA 1 MG mobile website from where you can order medicines and book lab tests.
Delivery slots and timelines for pharma are different from those on GrocerEase ?
GrocerEase  only redirects you to the TATA 1 MG mobile website. The delivery timelines for pharma will be the same as defined on the TATA 1 MG mobile website for your location.
Prices of the same product are different on bb and bbnow compared to pharma?

The pricing of products on pharma is defined by TATA 1 MG and not GrocerEase . There will be variations in product pricing if you wish to buy the same product available on GrocerEase  through TATA 1 MG.
What is the cancellation policy?

The cancellation policy for pharma is defined by TATA 1 MG. You can cancel the order until TATA 1 MG ships it. Orders once shipped cannot be canceled. GrocerEase  cancellation policies will not apply to pharma.
What is the refund policy?
Refund policy is defined by TATA 1 MG. Please get in touch with the TATA 1 MG customer service team to log a refund request.
What is the return policy?

Return policy on pharma is defined by TATA 1 MG. TATA 1 MG accepts returns if the medicine provided to you does not match your order, or if the medicine is past its expiry date. Please check your orders at the time of delivery and report any return request before you pay our delivery personnel.
Are GrocerEase  coupons and offers applicable on pharma?
No, GrocerEase  coupons and product promotions are not applicable on pharma.
Will my pharma order be delivered along with my GrocerEase  order?
No , pharma orders will be delivered by TATA 1 MG executives directly to your location. Delivery timelines will be defined by TATA 1 MG.
How do I know that the medicines delivered are authentic?

The product is being supplied directly by the vendors associated with TATA 1 MG and the company. The Vendor concerned shall solely be responsible for the authenticity and genuineness of the product so ordered.
I have issues with my order.
If you have any issues with TATA 1 MG please get in touch with them through their chat available on their mobile website, app or website.
If you have any complaints or suggestions about the content published on GrocerEase .com please write to our Grievance Officer at grievanceofficer@GrocerEase .com
